Jasny\HttpMessage\GlobalResponseStatus

PSR-7 methods for http response status that binds to the global environment

    Uses

    Members

    protected

    • $code — int
      HTTP Response status code.
    • $defaultStatuses — array
      Default phrases for the status codes based on the RCF7231
    • $phrase — string
      HTTP Response status phrase
    • $protocolVersion — string
      HTTP protocol version

    Methods

    protected

    • sendStatusHeader() — Send the HTTP header to set the HTTP response.
    • setStatus() — Set the specified status code and reason phrase.

    public

    • getReasonPhrase() — Gets the response reason phrase associated with the status code.
    • getStatusCode() — Gets the response status code.
    • withProtocolVersion() — Set the protocol version
    • withStatus() — Create a new response status object with the specified code and phrase.

    • assertStatusCode() — Assert that the status code is valid (100..999)

    • withStatus() — Create a new response status object with the specified code and phrase.
